channel.title: Docker on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on TLDRBins

item.title: Docker
item.description: Basic Commands # Show all running processes sudo docker ps -a # Show all images sudo docker images -a # Stop all processes sudo docker stop $(sudo docker ps -a -q) # Remove all processes sudo docker rm -vf $(sudo docker ps -a -q) # Remove all images sudo docker rmi -f $(sudo docker images -aq) # Shell in docker sudo docker exec -it <CONTAINER_ID> bash # Copy file from host to container sudo docker cp <HOST_FILE_PATH> <CONTAINER_ID>:<CONTAINER_FILE_PATH> # Copy file from container to host sudo docker cp <CONTAINER_ID>:<CONTAINER_FILE_PATH> <HOST_FILE_PATH> # Copy folder from host to container sudo docker cp <HOST_FOLDER_PATH>/.

item.title: Docker Registry
item.description: Docker Registry API # List repos curl -s -k --user "<USER>:<PASSWORD>" <TARGET>/v2/_catalog $ curl -s -k --user "admin:admin" https://docker.registry.htb/v2/_catalog {"repositories":["bolt-image"]} # List of tags of this repo curl -s -k --user "<USER>:<PASSWORD>" <TARGET>/v2/<REPO_NAME>/tags/list $ curl -s -k --user "admin:admin" https://docker.registry.htb/v2/bolt-image/tags/list {"name":"bolt-image","tags":["latest"]} # List manifest file for this tag (e.g. latest) curl -s -k --user "<USER>:<PASSWORD>" <TARGET>/v2/<REPO_NAME>/manifests/<TAG> $ curl -s -k --user "admin:admin" https://docker.registry.htb/v2/bolt-image/manifests/latest { "schemaVersion": 1, "name": "bolt-image", "tag": "latest", "architecture": "amd64", "fsLayers": [ { "blobSum": "sha256:302bfcb3f10c386a25a58913917257bd2fe772127e36645192fa35e4c6b3c66b" }, { "blobSum": "sha256:3f12770883a63c833eab7652242d55a95aea6e2ecd09e21c29d7d7b354f3d4ee" }, { "blobSum": "sha256:02666a14e1b55276ecb9812747cb1a95b78056f1d202b087d71096ca0b58c98c" }, ---[SNIP]--- } # Get a commit of the image curl -s -k --user "<USER>:<PASSWORD>" <TARGET>/v2/<REPO_NAME>/blobs/sha256:<BLOB_HASH> > <BLOB_HASH>.
